about.hero_subtitle: Learn about our journey, values, and the amazing team behind our success.
about.about_text1: PROWEBSA is a digital startup project initiated by Universite of Calvary Chapel', aiming to offer innovative technology services both nationally and internationally
about.about_text2: We specialize in creating professional websites, mobile applications, cybersecurity services, data analysis, and technology consulting solutions tailored to your needs.
about.about_text3: As passionate tech professionals, we believe in building solutions that have a lasting social, economic, and educational impact.
about.value_innovation_desc: We constantly push boundaries and explore new ideas.
about.value_collaboration_desc: We believe the best solutions come from working together.
about.value_excellence_desc: We strive for the highest quality in everything we do.
about.value_global_desc: We create solutions that make a difference worldwide.
about.mission_text: " Our mission at PROWEBSA is to design and deliver innovative and reliable digital solutions that address the unique needs of our clients while contributing to long-term social, economic, and educational progress. We are committed to developing cutting-edge services such as website creation, mobile applications, cybersecurity, data analysis, and technology consulting."
about.vision_text: " Our vision is to become a leading technology hub, recognized both nationally and internationally for our ability to provide tailored digital solutions with high added value. We strive to position PROWEBSA as a trusted partner that combines technical excellence with social responsibility, fostering innovation, supporting sustainable development, and promoting the image of a modern and reliable technology company."
about.cta_subtitle: Get in touch with our team today to discuss how we can help you achieve your goals.

portfolioItems.title: Universite Espoir de Calvary Chapel
portfolioItems.desc: UEspoir is a non-profit Christian university founded in 2015 by Calvary Chapel Port-au-Prince, With programs in Business, Computer Science, Education, and professional training, the university equips students with knowledge, skills, and values to thrive and serve their communities.

portfolioItems.title: Calvary Chapel Port au Prince
portfolioItems.desc: Calvary Chapel Port-au-Prince is a Christian church distinguished by verse-by-verse teaching of God’s Word. Our mission is to make disciples for Christ and prepare them to be available for every good work through the guidance of the Holy Spirit.

portfolioItems.title: Lapawoli
portfolioItems.desc: Welcome to Lapawoli, where faith and creativity come together to transform lives. Through media, events, and publications, we aim to inspire, uplift, and bring hearts closer to God’s Word.

insights.name: Alexandra M.
insights.quote: I always start by mapping possible vulnerabilities before writing a single line of code.

insights.name: James R.
insights.quote: I prefer React and Next.js for web apps: fast rendering, reusable components, and smooth user experiences.

insights.name: Kevin T.
insights.quote: Good UI is invisible. Users should feel the flow without thinking about it.

insights.name: Maya L.
insights.quote: Cybersecurity is not a one-time setup. It’s a culture of constant monitoring, testing, and adapting to new threats.

insights.name: Samuel P.
insights.quote: When handling big data, I focus on cleaning and structuring it before running analytics.

insights.name: Tara V.
insights.quote: Quality data is essential; insights are meaningless without it.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our services, processes, and policies. If you don't find what you're looking for, please don't hesitate to contact us directly.

questions.question: What services does PRowebsa offer?
questions.answer: PRowebsa offers a comprehensive range of digital services including web development, mobile app development, cybersecurity solutions, network setup and management, data analysis, and IT consulting. We provide end-to-end solutions tailored to your business needs.

questions.question: How long does a typical project take?
questions.answer: Project timelines vary based on complexity and scope. A simple website might take 2-4 weeks, while a complex custom application could take 3-6 months. During our initial consultation, we'll provide a detailed timeline based on your specific requirements.

questions.question: Do you work with startups?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We enjoy working with startups and offer scalable solutions that grow with your business. We can also provide guidance on technology choices that align with your growth trajectory and budget.

questions.question: What is your development process?
questions.answer: Our process follows these key stages: 1) Discovery and consultation to understand your needs, 2) Planning and strategy development, 3) Design and prototyping, 4) Development and implementation, 5) Testing and quality assurance, 6) Deployment and launch, and 7) Ongoing support and maintenance.

questions.question: How involved do I need to be during the project?
questions.answer: We recommend regular check-ins and feedback throughout the process. Typically, we schedule weekly update meetings and require client feedback at key milestones. The more engaged you are, the better the final product will align with your vision.

questions.question: Can I make changes during the development process?
questions.answer: Yes, but significant changes after development has started may impact timelines and costs. We use a change request process to evaluate the impact of modifications and adjust project parameters accordingly.

questions.question: What is your pricing model?
questions.answer: We offer flexible pricing models including fixed-price projects for well-defined scopes, time-and-materials for more fluid projects, and monthly retainers for ongoing support and maintenance. We'll recommend the best approach based on your project's characteristics.

questions.question: Do you require a deposit?
questions.answer: Yes, we typically require a 30-50% deposit to begin work, with the balance due upon project completion or according to a milestone payment schedule for larger projects.

questions.question: Are there any hidden costs?
questions.answer: We believe in transparent pricing. All costs will be outlined in your proposal, and we'll discuss any potential additional expenses before they're incurred. We'll also obtain your approval before proceeding with any work that falls outside the original scope.

questions.question: What technologies do you work with?
questions.answer: We work with a wide range of technologies including React, Angular, Vue.js, Node.js, Python, PHP, .NET, iOS Swift, Android Kotlin, and various databases and cloud platforms. We choose technologies based on your project requirements, scalability needs, and long-term maintenance considerations.

questions.question: Do you provide hosting services?
questions.answer: Yes, we can arrange hosting solutions tailored to your needs. We partner with reliable hosting providers and can manage your hosting environment, or we can deploy to your preferred hosting provider.

questions.question: Will my website be mobile-responsive?
questions.answer: Absolutely. All our web projects are developed with a mobile-first approach, ensuring optimal performance and user experience across all devices and screen sizes.

questions.question: Do you provide training?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive training and documentation to ensure you can manage your solution effectively. Training sessions are tailored to your team's technical proficiency and can be conducted in-person or remotely.

questions.question: What happens after my project is completed?
questions.answer: We offer ongoing support and maintenance packages to ensure your solution continues to perform optimally. These can include software updates, security monitoring, performance optimization, and technical support.

questions.question: How do I request support after project completion?
questions.answer: Our clients receive access to a dedicated support portal where they can submit tickets, request assistance, and track the status of their requests. We also provide emergency support for critical issues.

faq.footer_text: Still have questions? We're here to help!

help.title: Help & Support
help.description: We're committed to providing exceptional support throughout our engagement and beyond.

sections.title: Support Channels
sections.content:
Email: support@prowebsa.com
Phone: [+1] XXX-XXX-XXXX
Hours: Monday-Friday, 9am-6pm EST

sections.title: Response Times
sections.content: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 business hours. Emergency support is available for critical issues.

sections.title: Documentation
sections.content: Comprehensive documentation is provided for all delivered projects, including user guides and technical specifications.

howItWorks.title: How Prowebsa Works
howItWorks.description: At PRowebsa, we follow a streamlined process to ensure your project's success from conception to deployment and beyond.

process.detail: We begin by understanding your business goals, target audience, and project requirements through detailed consultations.
Our team creates a comprehensive project plan with timelines, milestones, and technology stack recommendations.
We develop wireframes and prototypes for your approval before moving to development.
Our developers bring your project to life using industry best practices and cutting-edge technologies.
We rigorously test your project across devices and browsers to ensure flawless performance.
We handle the complete deployment process and ensure a smooth launch.
We offer ongoing support and maintenance packages to keep your project running optimally.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: At Prowebsa, we value your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

sections.title: Information Collection
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly, including name, email, company details, and project requirements.

sections.title: Use of Information
sections.content: We use your information to provide services, communicate updates, and improve our offerings. We do not sell your data to third parties.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access.

sections.title: Cookies
sections.content: Our website uses cookies to enhance user experience and analyze site traffic. You can control cookies through your browser settings.

qualityGuide.title: Quality Guide
qualityGuide.description: At PRowebsa, quality isn't just a step in our process—it's embedded in everything we do. Our comprehensive quality assurance framework ensures that we deliver exceptional solutions that exceed expectations.

standards.secondary: We follow industry best practices, conduct peer code reviews, and maintain comprehensive documentation.
We optimize for speed, scalability, and efficiency to ensure your solution performs flawlessly under load.
We ensure your solution works seamlessly across devices, browsers, and operating systems.
We adhere to WCAG guidelines to make your digital products accessible to all users.

process.secondary: Thorough analysis of project requirements to establish clear quality benchmarks.
Development of comprehensive test plans covering functionality, performance, security, and usability.
Testing throughout the development lifecycle, not just at the end of the project.
Involving stakeholders in the testing process to ensure the solution meets business needs.

qualityGuide.contactText: Want to learn more about our quality processes?
qualityGuide.contactLink: Reach out to our quality team

stories.title: Success Stories
stories.description: Discover how PRowebsa has helped businesses transform their digital presence and achieve their goals through innovative technology solutions.

storiesList.title: FinTech Innovation

storiesList.title: Education Platform

stories.ctaText: Want to be our next success story?

sections.title: 1. Introduction
sections.content: PRowebsa ("we," "us," "our") provides web development, mobile applications, cybersecurity, and IT consulting services. These Terms govern your use of our services.

sections.title: 2. Services
sections.content: We will deliver services as detailed in our proposals and statements of work. The scope, timeline, and deliverables will be specified in project documentation.

sections.title: 3. Client Responsibilities
sections.content: Clients must provide necessary materials, information, and feedback in a timely manner. Delays may impact project timelines and costs.

sections.title: 4. Payment Terms
sections.content: Payment schedules will be outlined in project proposals. Late payments may incur fees and result in service suspension.

sections.title: 5. Intellectual Property
sections.content: Upon full payment, clients receive ownership of custom-developed work. PRowebsa retains rights to pre-existing tools and frameworks.

sections.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
sections.content: Our liability is limited to the amount paid for services. We are not liable for indirect or consequential damages.

trustSafety.title: Trust & Safety
trustSafety.intro: At PRowebsa, we prioritize the security and integrity of our clients' data and digital assets. Our comprehensive trust and safety protocols ensure your peace of mind throughout our engagement.

securityMeasures.secondary: All sensitive data is encrypted in transit and at rest using industry-standard protocols.
We follow OWASP guidelines and conduct regular security audits throughout the development lifecycle.
Our processes align with GDPR, HIPAA, and other relevant compliance frameworks based on project requirements.

trustSafety.commitmentIntro: We understand that trust is earned through consistent performance and transparency. That's why we:
commitmentItems: Maintain clear communication channels throughout our engagement
Provide regular progress updates and demonstrations
Offer transparent pricing with no hidden fees
Sign comprehensive confidentiality agreements before project initiation
Carry professional liability insurance to protect your investment
